        public static List<FSFFile> listFilesTree(FSFFile file)
                                   throws Exception
        Parameters:
        file - file object which holds the directory of which the files tree should be listed
        Returns:
        all sub-items recursively and as a list ordered by path
        Throws:
        Exception - on general error

      • listFilesTree

        public static List<FSFFile> listFilesTree(FSFFile file,
                                          Set<String> filenamesToSkip)
                                   throws Exception
        Parameters:
        file - file object that holds the directory of which the file tree should be listed
        filenamesToSkip - list of filenames to be skipped (e.g. history directories)
        Returns:
        all sub-items recursively and as a list ordered by path
        Throws:
        Exception - on general error

      • copyFilesTree

        public static void copyFilesTree(FSFFile source,
                                 FSFFile dest,
                                 boolean copyVersionData)
                          throws Exception
        copies all sub-items recursively to the dest directory
        Parameters:
        source - source directory to be copied
        dest - dest directory to be copied to
        copyVersionData - if true the version data is copied as well
        Throws:
        Exception - on general error
